ygData.subject: Re: Re:suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: Please take me off of the mailing list. ... From: Philip K  To:  Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 1999 8:45 AM Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
Please take me off of the mailing list.
----- Original Message -----
From: Philip K <halwar@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 1999 8:45 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Re:suggestions


> From: Philip K <halwar@...>
>
> Heya =)
>
> Well , I would suggest High Hold Pass . I stayed in that area until I was
> level 20 and got decent exp as well as loot (plus you can get to try your
> hands on a few nice items such as the polished granite tomahawk , shiney
> brass halberd or cracked darkwood shield) . This is also a great place
> because it's located very close to a bank (In High Hold Keep). I hope this
> helps =)
>
> - Nystul on Tarew Marr , Nahema on Tallon Zek
>
> >I have a question on what critter next? I am a (almost) level 17 Cleric
> >fighting in Lesser Faydark at the Bandit camp. I like to hunt in small
> >groups (right now a 16 warrior and I), decent loot and fairly easy body
> >retreival if I die. Any suggestions? I play on Tunare. Addie is my
name,
> >so say hello ifn ya see me.
> >Thanks adventure Addie
> >
